title: Huckabee campaigning across upstate South Carolina
text:
Huckabee campaigning across upstate South Carolina Former Arkansas Gov. Mike Huckabee is bringing his presidential campaign back to South Carolina this week. Post to Facebook Huckabee campaigning across upstate South Carolina Former Arkansas Gov. Mike Huckabee is bringing his presidential campaign back to South Carolina this week.  //www.wcnc.com/story/news/politics/2015/10/22/huckabee-campaigning-across-upstate-south-carolina/74386424/   Huckabee campaigning across upstate South Carolina Associated Press, AP 11:06 a.m. EDT October 22, 2015 Mike Huckabee, former governor of Arkansas and 2016 Republican presidential candidate, speaks during the Values Voter Summit in Washington, D.C., U.S., on Friday, Sept. 25, 2015. The annual event, organized by the Family Research Council, gives presidential contenders a chance to address a conservative Christian audience in the crowded Republican primary contest. Photographer: Drew Angerer/Bloomberg via Getty Images (Photo: Drew Angerer) CONNECT TWEET   
ANDERSON, S.C. (AP) - Former Arkansas Gov. Mike Huckabee is bringing his presidential campaign back to South Carolina this week. 
On Thursday, the Republican hopeful starts off in Anderson with a media availability at NewSpring Church. 
Later in the day, he's expected to make a stop at a coffee shop in Greenville. 
Thursday evening, Huckabee is taking part in a Big Game Supper at Cherokee Avenue Baptist Church in Gaffney. 
Friday morning, Huckabee meets with supporters at Grapevine Restaurant in Boiling Springs before going to Greenville to participate in a national security forum hosted by Americans for Peace, Prosperity and Security.  //www.wcnc.com/story/news/politics/2015/10/22/huckabee-campaigning-across-upstate-south-carolina/74386424/ TOP VIDEOS
